content.html: One of the nice things about opinionated frameworks: They’re friendly to new developers. Fewer decisions and more prescriptive guidance = less stress. And, it’s easier to move between different projects each project follows the same conventions.
content.value:
One of the nice things about opinionated frameworks: They’re friendly to new developers.

Fewer decisions and more prescriptive guidance = less stress.

And, it’s easier to move between different projects each project follows the same conventions.
